description: Demo payloads for Mindflow AI API - Use these for testing and development

examples.name: Morning Reflection - Positive
examples.description: A positive morning reflection with good mood scores

payload.text: Woke up feeling grateful today. Had a great conversation with my mom yesterday and finally finished that project I've been working on. Feeling energized and ready to tackle the day. Planning to go for a run this evening and maybe cook a nice dinner.

examples.name: Work Stress - Overwhelmed
examples.description: Someone feeling overwhelmed with work and life

payload.text: I'm so overwhelmed right now. Work is piling up, I have three deadlines this week, and I haven't had time to exercise or see friends. I feel like I'm constantly behind and can't catch up. Need to figure out how to manage my time better and maybe talk to my manager about the workload.

Had a difficult conversation with my partner last night. We've been arguing more lately and I'm not sure what's going wrong. I want to work on our communication but I also need to take better care of myself. Haven't been sleeping well and I think that's affecting everything.

examples.name: Health and Wellness Goals
examples.description: Focus on health and wellness improvements

payload.text: I want to start taking better care of my health. Need to schedule a doctor's appointment, start meal planning, and get back into a regular exercise routine. Also want to reduce my screen time before bed to improve sleep quality.

examples.name: Minimal Payload
examples.description: Minimal brain dump with just text (no optional fields)

payload.text: Feeling anxious about the presentation tomorrow. Need to practice more and review my notes.

examples.name: Long Form Entry
examples.description: A longer, more detailed brain dump entry

payload.text: Today has been a rollercoaster. Started the morning feeling really anxious about my job interview next week. Spent hours preparing answers to common questions and researching the company. Then I had lunch with Sarah and we talked about her recent trip to Japan - that was really nice and helped me relax a bit. In the afternoon, I got some good news about a freelance project I applied for, which boosted my confidence. But now I'm feeling tired and a bit overwhelmed thinking about everything I need to do: finish the presentation, prepare for the interview, call my dentist to reschedule, and figure out my budget for next month. I know I need to prioritize but it's hard to know where to start.
payload.context: Mixed emotions, multiple tasks, life planning

createExamples.name: Initial Wellness Setup - Young Professional
createExamples.description: Complete initial wellness check-in for a young professional

questions.toughDayMessage: When I'm having a tough day, I need someone to remind me that it's okay to take breaks

createExamples.name: Initial Wellness Setup - Student
createExamples.description: Complete initial wellness check-in for a student

questions.stressNotes: Exams are coming up and I'm worried about my grades

createExamples.name: Minimal Wellness Setup
createExamples.description: Minimal wellness check-in with only required fields

updateExamples.name: Update Mood and Stress Notes
updateExamples.description: Update only mood level and add stress notes

questions.stressNotes: Had a difficult meeting with my manager today. Feeling uncertain about my role.

updateExamples.name: Update Time Availability
updateExamples.description: Update weekday and weekend time slots

updateExamples.name: Update Focus Areas and Questions
updateExamples.description: Change focus areas and update related questions

updateExamples.name: Enable Reminders
updateExamples.description: Enable daily reminders with specific time

updateExamples.name: Update Multiple Fields
updateExamples.description: Update mood, focus areas, and questions together

questions.gratitudePractice: Writing three things I'm grateful for each morning
questions.toughDayMessage: On tough days, I remind myself of my progress and practice self-compassion

addToCalendar.description: Add task to calendar payloads - POST /brain-dump/add-to-calendar

examples.name: Single Task with Date and Time
examples.description: Add a specific task with scheduling details

payload.notes: Need to follow up on the claim I submitted last week
Start my day with 15 minutes of mindfulness
Prepare healthy meals for the upcoming week

examples.name: Minimal Task
examples.description: Add a task with only required fields

brainDump: All brain dump requests require 'text' field (minimum 3 characters)
Optional fields: context, mood (0-10), stress (0-10), purpose (0-10)
Response includes: userProfile, keyThemes, aiSummary, suggestedActivities, and more
wellnessCheckIn: Wellness check-in uses PATCH method - only send fields you want to update
Optional fields: reminderEnabled, reminderTime, ageRange, focusAreas, time slots, questions
Questions dictionary can contain any dynamic questions based on focus areas
addToCalendar: Optional: notes, date, time, reminderEnabled, brainDumpEntryId
general: Replace placeholder GUIDs with actual values from your system
